THE REALM RECIPE CONTEST

Sponsored by the Muse & Merriment Guild

WINNERS POSTED BELOW



Contest Deadline November 26, 1998



RECIPE CONTEST RULES

I. Categories

There are two categories:
      a.  Edible -- a recipe that is real
      b.  Fantastic -- meaning, not meant to be cooked or eaten

Just about anything goes -- however, NO obscenties nor smutty innuendoes will be permitted!


II. Participants

Any Realm player of any level and of any alignment.

III. How to Enter

Send an email to our Judges using the link below
  1. Let them know you wish to participate.
  2. Indicate the name of your character.
  3. Include your recipe first listing all the ingredients followed by details as to what to mix and how to cook, etc.
  4. Indicate which category you are entering.

Contest Judge


Our Judge is:

Macro

Let your creative juices flow. Your recipe will be judged on originality, content, and whatever else might strike the fancy of our Judge(s).

The entries will be published in the M&M Guild's Newsletter.
